entry.title: WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 17.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 40 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
